main event: Two objects were observed on the ground near Loma Linda, California, on December 8, 1957.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be the size of a basketball and white in color with small white dots at the ends., The observation lasted for about 2-3 minutes., The sighting was categorized as a possible aircraft sighting., The objects reportedly moved very slowly toward Norton Air Force Base., The official signed comment suggested it could be a weather balloon.
sighted object: two white objects on the ground
